meanings.definition: The quality or state of being initial.
meanings.sent1: The initialness of the project was evident from the very start.
meanings.sent2: Her initialness in the new job showed her enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: The initialness of the puppy's curiosity led to some funny situations.
meanings.sent4: The initialness of the sunrise painted the sky with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The initialness of the puzzle made it challenging yet exciting to solve.

meanings.definition: The act of beginning or starting something.
meanings.sent1: Without the initialness of the meeting, we wouldn't have progressed.
meanings.sent2: The initialness of the race signaled the excitement to come.
meanings.sent3: The initialness of the party planning brought out everyone's creative ideas.
meanings.sent4: The initialness of the journey felt like stepping into a new world.
meanings.sent5: The initialness of the song set the tone for the entire performance.

meanings.definition: The first letter of a word or name.
meanings.sent1: The initialness 'H' in her name made it unique.
meanings.sent2: He wrote his initials with the initialness 'J'.
meanings.sent3: The initialness 'A' on the document indicated the author.
meanings.sent4: The initialness 'B' on the book cover caught my attention.
meanings.sent5: The initialness 'M' on the map marked the starting point of the trail.
